title: ‘Two Dreams in 24 Hours’: From Olympic Silver to Tour de France Femmes Contention
content:
After nailing whirlwind logistics, omnium silver medalist Daria Pikulik and Canada's Maggie Coles-Lyster feel track racing is good prep for an early stage win: ‘Anything can happen this week’

Read the full article at ‘Two Dreams in 24 Hours’: From Olympic Silver to Tour de France Femmes Contention on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
